ActJudges Act
SubjectElizabeth Hudson ** WIDOW'S ANNUITY ** The Hon. J. Drew Hudson
PrecisGranting of an annuity to ELIZABETH HUDSON, widow of the Honourable J. Drew Hudson, a Judge of the Ontario Court of Justice (General Division), effective May 24, 2009.
AttachmentsAttachment
